package.name: miniOrange_samlsp
package.summary: miniOrange SAML 2.0 Extension provides SSO to your Magento site with any SAML compliant Identity Provider.
package.description:
miniOrange SAML 2.0 SSO allows users residing at SAML 2.0 compliant Identity Provider to login to your Magento Store. miniOrange SAML SSO Extension acts as a SAML 2.0 Service Provider which can be configured to establish the trust between the extension and various SAML 2.0 supported Identity Providers to securely authenticate the user to the Magento store. We support all known IdPs - Google Apps, ADFS, Okta, Salesforce, Shibboleth, SimpleSAMLphp, OpenAM, Centrify, Ping, RSA, IBM, Oracle, OneLogin, Bitium, WSO2, NetIQ etc.
Free Version Features:
1. Unlimited authentication with your SAML 2.0 compliant Identity Providers. 2. Automatic user registration after login if the user is not already registered with your site. 3. Options to easily integrate the login link with your Magento site. 4. Use Basic Attribute Mapping feature to map Magento user profile attributes like First Name, Last Name to the attributes provided by your IDP. 5. Select default role to assign to users on auto registration. 6. Force authentication with your IDP on each login attempt. Premium Version Features: 1. All the Free version features. 2. SAML Single Logout - Support for SAML Single Logout (Works only if your IDP supports SLO). 3. Advanced Attribute Mapping - Use this feature to map your IDP attributes to your Magento site attributes like Username, Email, First Name, Last Name, Group/Role, Display Name. 4. Advanced Role Mapping - Use this feature to assign Magento roles your users based on the group/role sent by your IDP. 5. Short Code - Use Short Code to place the login link wherever you want on the site. 6. Select Binding Type - Select HTTP-Post or HTTP-Redirect binding type to use for sending SAML Requests. 7. Step-by-step Guides - Use step-by-step guide to configure your Identity Provider like ADFS, Centrify, Google Apps, Okta, OneLogin, Salesforce, SimpleSAMLphp, Shibboleth, WSO2, JBoss Keycloak, Oracle. If you require any Single Sign On application or need any help with installing this plugin, please feel free to email us at info@miniorange.com or Contact us
